column4: no, but I can tell you an alternative that I much prefer: setup some nice keybindings (I use shift+f1 and shift+f2 for volume up/down and shift+f3 for mute)
well if you fetch sources upstream and isolate the revision that made it depend on pulseaudio, I'd say you have a decent shot...
from what version to what version?
remove xserver-xorg-video-nouveau if it's installed and try again
